mapper.select: SELECT board.board_no boardNo, board.reserve_name reserveName, board.room_Name roomName, to_char(board.board_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as boardDate FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum,board_no,reserve_name,room_name,board_date FROM (SELECT board_no,reserve_name,room_name,board_date from reserveComplete where location='P' order by Board_no+0 desc) ) board where rnum between ((#{curPage}-1)*10)+1 AND #{curPage}*10
select count(board_No) from reserveComplete where location='P'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reserveComplete WHERE BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} AND location='P'
mapper.update: UPDATE reserveComplete SET reserve_name = #{reserveName}, room_name = #{roomName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, people_number= #{peopleNumber}, price = #{price}, phone = #{phone}, kakao_id = #{kakaoId} WHERE BOARD_NO=${boardNo} AND location='P'
